resources.string: "Sign in to get your bookmarks, history, passwords and other settings on all your devices"
"Disabled by the administrator of this device"
"Control how Google uses your browsing history to personalise Search, ads and other Google services."
"Control how Google uses your browsing history to personalise Search and other Google services."
"Control how your browsing history is used to personalise Search, ads and more"
"Sync error occurred, tap to get details."
"Your browsing data and activity, synced to your Google account"
"Communicates with Google to improve browsing and Brave"
"Sends some cookies and searches from the address bar and search box to your default search engine"
"Preload pages for faster browsing and searching"
"Uses cookies to remember your preferences, even if you don\'t visit those pages"
"Show suggestions for similar pages when a page can\'t be found"
"Sends the URL of a page that you\'re trying to reach to Google"
"Sends URLs of pages that you visit to Google"
"For more settings that relate to privacy, security and data collection, see <link>Sync and Google services</link>"
"Automatically sends usage statistics and crash reports to Google"
"Notifications are allowed. Location is off for this device."
"Location is off; turn it on in <link>Android Settings</link>."
"You can change this later in Settings"
"On some websites, you can pay with above supported payment apps on your device."
"Automatically sign in to websites using stored credentials. When the feature is off, you’ll be asked for verification every time before signing in to a website."
"View and manage saved passwords in your <link>Google account</link>"
"To view or copy your password here, set screen lock on this device."
"Turn on screen lock in Settings to export your passwords from this device"
"Your passwords will be visible to anyone who can see the exported file."
"Your device doesn’t have an app to store the passwords file."
"Try the following tips: make sure that there is enough space on your device; try to export again."
"When you scroll up, show quick links to related pages. The URLs of pages that you visit are sent to Google."
"When you tap More like this <icon> </icon> in the address bar, show quick links to related pages. The URLs of pages that you visit are sent to Google."
"To use this feature, turn on <link>Activity and interactions</link>."
"Show suggestions when a web address does not resolve or a connection cannot be made"
"Use a prediction service to show related queries and popular websites as you type in the address bar"
"Use prediction services to suggest search terms and websites"
"Automatically report details of possible security incidents to Google"
"Sends some system information and page content to Google"
"Protects you and your device from dangerous sites"
"Preload pages for faster loading and offline reading"

"Learn about topics on websites without leaving the page. Tap to Search sends a word and its surrounding context to Google Search, returning definitions, pictures, search results and other details.
To adjust your search term, long press to select. To refine your search, slide the panel all the way up and tap the search box."
"Tap to Search sends the selected word and the current page as context to Google Search. You can turn it off in <link>Settings</link>."

"Enabling “Do Not Track” means that a request will be included with your browsing traffic. Any effect depends on whether a website responds to the request and how the request is interpreted.
For example, some websites may respond to this request by showing you ads that aren’t based on other websites that you’ve visited. Many websites will still collect and use your browsing data – for example to improve security, to provide content, ads and recommendations and to generate reporting statistics."

"The selected data has been removed from Brave and your synced devices.
Your Google Account may have other forms of browsing history such as searches and activity from other Google services at <link>myactivity.google.com</link>."
"Clears history and autocompletions in the address bar."
"Clears history and autocompletions in the address bar. Your Google account may have other forms of browsing history at <link>myactivity.google.com</link>."
"Clears history from all signed-in devices. Your Google account may have other forms of browsing history at <link>myactivity.google.com</link>."
"This will clear data for all sites, including:"
"Your Google account may have other forms of browsing history at <link>myactivity.google.com</link>."
"Automatically send usage statistics and crash reports to Google"
"Drag the slider until you can read this comfortably. Text should look at least this big after double-tapping on a paragraph."
"Override a website’s request to prevent zooming in"
"Offer to show articles in simplified view, when supported"
"Recommended when TalkBack or Switch Access are on"
"This site tends to show intrusive ads"
"Third-party websites can save and read cookie data"
"Allow auto-play of muted videos for a specific site."
"Allow Background Sync for a specific site."
"Allow sites to save and read cookie data (recommended)"
"Allow sites to automatically play muted videos (recommended)"
"Unavailable when Data Saver is turned on"
"Ask before allowing sites to read text and images from the clipboard (recommended)"
"Block sites from reading text and images from the clipboard"
"Ask before allowing sites to play protected content"
"Ask before allowing sites to connect to a device (recommended)"
"Block sites from showing pop-ups and redirects (recommended)"
"Block ads from sites that tend to show intrusive ads"
"Block if site tends to show intrusive ads (recommended)"
"Ask before allowing sites to know your location (recommended)"
"Ask before allowing sites to send notifications (recommended)"
"Ask first before allowing sites to use your camera (recommended)"
"Ask first before allowing sites to use your microphone (recommended)"
"Are you sure that you want to clear all local data, including cookies, and reset all permissions for this website?"
"All local data stored by this website, including cookies, will be deleted."
"Websites will show text in your preferred language, when possible."
"Offer to translate pages in other languages"
"Turn on permissions for Brave in <link>Android Settings</link>."
"Turn on permission for Brave in <link>Android Settings</link>."
"Location access is off for this device. Turn it on in <link>Android Settings</link>."
"Location access is also off for this device. Turn it on in <link>Android Settings</link>."
"Reset failed. Ensure that your device is online and try again."

"Content (films, music, etc.) downloaded in other applications may no longer be playable until those applications re-acquire licences based on a new device credential. To obtain new licences, connect to the Internet and play your downloaded content."
"When this feature is turned on, Brave will offer to translate pages written in other languages using Google Translate."

"When this feature is turned on, Brave will use Google servers to compress pages that you visit before downloading them. Pages accessed using private connections (HTTPS) or in Incognito tabs will not be optimised or seen by Google."
"Details: Sorted by amount of data used"
"Details: Sorted by amount of data saved"
"Resetting erases Data Saver history, including the list of visited sites."
"Chrome’s Safe Browsing system will also be used to detect malicious pages and protect you from phishing, malware and harmful downloads."
"This feature may interfere with access to premium data services provided by your operator."
"Use up to 60% less data and speed up the web. Google servers will optimise the pages you visit."
"Data Saver is on. Manage it in Settings."
"Google servers will optimise the pages that you visit, except for HTTPS and Incognito."
"SD card not found. Some of your files may be missing."
"Copyright %1$d Brave Software Inc. All rights reserved."
"Brave updates are no longer supported for this version of Android."
"Prevent this page from creating additional dialogues"
"Changes to your bookmarks, history, passwords and other settings will no longer be synced to your Google Account. However, your existing data will remain stored in your Google account."
"Your bookmarks, history, passwords and more will no longer be synced to your Google account"
"You are signing out of an account managed by %1$s. This will delete the Brave data stored on this device, but the data will remain in your Google Account."
"Contacting Google. This may take a minute…"

"You are signing in with an account managed by %1$s and giving its administrator control over your Brave data. Your data will become permanently tied to this account. Signing out of Brave will delete your data from this device, but it will remain stored in your Google account."
"You are signing out of an account managed by %1$s. This will delete your Brave data from this device, but your data will remain in your Google account."
"You are switching sync accounts from %1$s to %2$s. Your existing Brave data is managed by %3$s. This will delete your data from this device, but your data will remain in %1$s."
"Bookmarks saved on your other devices will appear here."
"To get your tabs from your other devices, turn on sync."
"To get your tabs from your other devices, turn on “Auto-sync data” in Android account settings."
"Tabs that you\'ve opened in Brave on your other devices will appear here."
"Get your bookmarks, history, passwords and other settings on all your devices"
"Credit cards and addresses using Google Pay"
"Uses content on sites that you visit, plus browser activity and interactions, for personalisation"
"Encrypt all with Google password as of %1$s"
"Encrypt all synced data with your own sync passphrase"

"Only someone with your passphrase can read your encrypted data. The passphrase is not sent to or stored by Google. If you forget your passphrase or want to change this setting you\'ll need to reset sync. <learnmore>Find out more</learnmore>"
"If you forgot your passphrase or want to change this setting, <resetlink>reset sync</resetlink>"
"You have bookmarks, history, passwords and other settings from %1$s."
"Delete existing data. You can retrieve it by switching back to %1$s."
"Brave is unable to turn on Bluetooth adaptor"
"Brave needs location access to scan for devices. <permission_link>Update permissions</permission_link>"
"Brave needs location access to scan for devices. Location access is <services_link>turned off for this device</services_link>."
"Brave needs location access to scan for devices. <permission_link>Update permissions</permission_link>. Location access is also <services_link>turned off for this device</services_link>."
"Open Android settings and re-enable Android system sync to start Brave sync"
"Could not connect to the sync server."
"The service is not available; try again later."
"Options available near bottom of the screen"
"Options available near the top of the screen"
"Simplified page to save data and load faster."
"Do you want to start downloading ^1 again?"
"Oops. This page could not be translated."
"Pages in %1$s will be translated to %2$s from now on"
"There was a problem printing the page. Please try again."
"Brave needs permission to access your camera for this site."
"Brave needs permission to access your microphone for this site."
"Brave needs permission to access your camera and microphone for this site."
"Brave needs access to your location to share your location with this site."
"Brave needs storage access to download files."
"View app %1$s on the Play Store. Rating: %2$.1f."
"Get the app from the Google Play Store: %s"
"You need to update TalkBack to a newer version."
"%1$s was added to your Home screen"
"You are viewing an offline copy of this page from %1$s"
"This offline page is from %1$s and may differ from the online version."
"This page may differ from the online version."
"This content is from %1$s, delivered by Google."
"If you’re seeing this frequently, try these <link>suggestions</link>."
"Drag from top and touch the back button to exit full screen."
"Touch the back button to exit full screen."
"%1$s download prevented because file already exists."
"%1$s download failed due to file system errors."
"%1$s download failed due to lack of storage space."
"%1$s download failed due to network failures."
"%1$s download failed due to server issues."
"%1$s download failed because storage location is not reachable."
"%1$s download failed due to an unknown error."
"Open the suggested URL specified in the downloaded content?"
"Insufficient memory to download the selected content."
"Device cannot open the content to be downloaded."
"An error occurred while downloading the content."
"Allow Brave to download articles for you when on Wi-Fi under settings."
"Critical functionality required to run Brave is missing; either your Brave installation is incomplete or not compatible with this version of Android."
"Chrome’s components are incompatible with one another. Brave may be upgrading, please try again in a few minutes. If the problem continues, try uninstalling and re-installing Brave."
"Brave failed during start-up with an unexpected error."
"By using this application, you agree to Chrome’s <LINK1>Terms of Service</LINK1> and <LINK2>Privacy Notice</LINK2>."

"By using this application, you agree to Chrome’s <LINK1>Terms of Service</LINK1> and <LINK2>Privacy Notice</LINK2>, and the <LINK3>Privacy Notice for Google Accounts Managed with Family Link</LINK3>."
"%1$s will open in Brave. By continuing, you agree to Chrome’s <LINK1>Terms of Service</LINK1> and <LINK2>Privacy Notice</LINK2>."

"%1$s will open in Brave. By continuing, you agree to Brave\'s <LINK1>Terms of Service</LINK1> and <LINK2>Privacy Notice</LINK2>, and the <LINK3>Privacy Notice for Google Accounts Managed with Family Link</LINK3>."
"Help make Brave better by sending usage statistics and crash reports to Google."
"Sign in with your Google Account to get your bookmarks, history, passwords and other settings on all your devices."
"Add a Google account from the Accounts page in your device’s Settings app."
"You and your parents can manage Brave Sync and personalisation in <LINK1>Settings</LINK1>"
"Waiting for Google Play Services to finish updating"
"Your passwords, history & more on all devices"
"More personal Google services, such as better page suggestions"
"Improve Brave and its security by sending system and usage data to Google"

"<LINK1>Settings</LINK1> can be customised at any time. Google may use content on sites that you visit, plus browser activity and interactions, to personalise Brave and other Google services such as Translate, Search and ads."

"<LINK1>Settings</LINK1> can be customised by you or your parents at any time. Google may use content on sites that you visit, as well as browsing activity and interactions, to personalise Brave and Google services such as Translate, Search and ads."
"The settings that control sync, personalisation and other Google services in Brave have changed. This may affect your current settings."
"The data that you sync to Google and the features that you use will not change"
"Review your settings on the next screen"
"Turn on sync, personalisation and other Google services"
"You can customise this at any time in Brave Settings"
"To get your bookmarks on all your devices, sign in to Brave."
"To get personalised content suggested by Google, sign in to Brave."
"To get your tabs from your other devices, sign in to Brave."
"Sign in to Brave to get your bookmarks, passwords and more on all your devices."
"To get your bookmarks on all your devices, turn on sync"
"To get your bookmarks on all your devices, sign in and turn on sync"
"To get personalised content suggested by Google, turn on sync"
"To get personalised content suggested by Google, sign in and turn on sync"
"To get your tabs from your other devices, turn on sync"
"To get your tabs from your other devices, sign in and turn on sync"
"To sync and personalise across devices, turn on sync"
"To sync and personalise across devices, sign in and turn on sync"
"Your most visited pages will appear here"
"More articles will appear soon. Enjoy your morning!"
"More articles will appear soon. Enjoy your afternoon!"
"More articles will appear soon. Enjoy your evening!"
"Viewing an offline copy of this page"
"Your connection to this site is not secure. Site information"
"%1$s selected. Options available near top of the screen"
"See instant search results in this panel"
"Tap a word to search instantly or see related actions"
"You can also search with a quick tap on a word"
"Site storage Brave doesn\'t think is important (e.g. sites with no saved settings or that you don\'t visit often)"
"This will clear cookies, cache and other data of sites Brave doesn\'t think is important."
"All site storage, including cookies and other locally stored data"
"Total data used by Brave, including accounts, bookmarks and saved settings"
"All Chrome’s app data will be deleted permanently. This includes all files, settings, accounts, databases, etc."
"This will clear all %1$s of website storage."
"Client side certificate selection is not supported by the operating system."
"Tap this button for quick access to your tabs."
"Brave can use Sogou for search in China. You can change this in Settings."
"Tap to copy the URL for this app"
"To use %1$s, please connect to the Internet."
"To use %1$s for the first time, please connect to the Internet."
"Establishing a tunnel via proxy server failed"
"Open a new tab in Incognito mode"
"Open a new tab in private mode"
"Return everything on the page to default size"
"Reload the current page, ignoring cached content"
"Open the Brave Help Centre in a new tab"
"Help improve the VR experience in Brave"
"To view virtual reality content, install Google VR Services"
"To view virtual reality content, update Google VR Services"
"To view augmented reality content, install ARCore"
"To view augmented reality content, update ARCore"
"Download pages from the More Options button to use them offline"
"Find your files and pages in Downloads"
"Find your files and pages in Downloads from the More Options button"
"Brave is using less data to show you this page"
"See how much data you\'ve saved from the More Options button"
"Download videos to watch later using the Download button"
"Change the default download location at any time"
"Change the default download location at any time using the Settings menu option"
"Tap to load the new tab page and view suggested articles"
"Tap the home button to load the new tab page and view suggested articles"
"Your icons have moved to the bottom of the screen"
"This page uses too much memory, so Brave paused it."
"This page uses too much memory, so Brave removed some content."
"You are about to open an Incognito Custom Tab, while having other incognito tabs active.\n\nIncognito Custom Tabs share the same profile, so you risk giving access to your Incognito data."
"Opens supported sites using HTTPS instead of HTTP when possible"
"Prevents resources that track you from loading"
"No additional lists available for your locale"
"Sync browser data between your devices securely using Brave Sync, no account creation required. Tap below to get started."
"Enter an optional name for this device"
"Using existing synced device open Brave Settings and navigate to \"Device & Settings\", tap `+` to add a new device and reveal sync code."
"Are you sure you want to reset this device Sync settings?"
"Use mobile versions of sites for new tabs (recommended)"
"Experimental. Enables play audio from video in background when tab is not active or device screen is turned off. Try to switch to desktop mode if this feature is not working."
"Your changes will take effect the next time you relaunch Brave"
"If enabled, videos will be played in Brave instead of corresponding app"

"With private search, Brave will use DuckDuckGo to answer your searches while you are in this private tab. DuckDuckGo is a search engine that does not track your search history, enabling you to search privately."
"Even though sites you visit in private tabs are not saved locally, they do not make you anonymous or invisible to your ISP, your employer, or to the sites you are visiting."
"Offer to open tabs in Custom Tabs"
